feed.title: Yash Goel
feed.subtitle:
I am an ML/CV engineer at [SafeAD](https://www.safead.de/) working on 3D object detection and HD maps using transformers. During my masters at the [University of Bonn](https://www.uni-bonn.de/en), I worked as a student researcher at [StachnissLab](https://www.ipb.uni-bonn.de/) and did my master thesis at [Bosch Research](https://www.bosch.com/research/) in Renningen, DE.

Before that, I was a research assistant at [Robotics Research Center, IIIT Hyderabad](https://robotics.iiit.ac.in/). I did my bachelors in mechanical engineering from [IIT Roorkee](https://www.iitr.ac.in/).
